title: 'Boys and Girl - Cowboys LB Leighton Vander Esch Talks Neck Injury, Rehab, 2020 Defensive Changes
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - Cowboys LB Leighton Vander Esch Talks Neck Injury, Rehab, 2020 Defensive Changes
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby chat with Cowboys linebacker Leighton Vander Esch about his rehab from a neck injury, how he’s preparing for next season, and some of the changes on defense.

Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
